dmca.title: [ABUSE] FIRST NOTICE OF INFRINGEMENT AND DECLARATION: WARNER BROS. RECORDS, INC. | PA

The files were removed earlier today.  Thank you!!

________________________

Dorothy Sherman
President
GrayZone, Inc.
P.O. Box 22068
Brooklyn, NY  11202-2068

Tel:   718.243.0593
Cell:  347.385.5280
Fax:  718 552-3028
e-mail:  grayzone@grayzone.com

www.grayzone.com

PLEASE NOTE OUR NEW E-MAIL ADDRESS:
GRAYZONE@GRAYZONE.COM


----- Original Message ----- 
From: "Copyright" <Copyright@theplanet.com>
To: <grayzone@grayzone.com>
Cc: <Theplanet@chillingeffects.org>
Sent: Tuesday, June 06, 2006 3:29 PM
Subject: FW: [Fwd: [ABUSE] FIRST NOTICE OF INFRINGEMENT AND DECLARATION: 
WARNER BROS. RECORDS, INC. | PARIS HILTON [putfile.com]]


We are unable to locate on the web pages
http://media.putfile.com/Paris-Hilton---Stars-are-Blind
http://media.putfile.com/Paris-Hilton---Heartbeat
http://media.putfile.com/Paris-Hilton---Stop
http://media.putfile.com/Paris-Hilton---Jealousy
http://media.putfile.com/Turn-it-UP-27
http://www.putfile.com/buzzfactor
any of the material that you claim is being infringed as of 2:29:02 p.m.
(GMT-6).

Legal Response Team
ThePlanet.com

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of The Planet Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Sunday, June 04, 2006 1:04 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] FIRST NOTICE OF INFRINGEMENT AND
DECLARATION: WARNER BROS. RECORDS, INC. | PARIS HILTON [putfile.com]]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] FIRST NOTICE OF INFRINGEMENT AND DECLARATION:
WARNER BROS. RECORDS, INC. | PARIS HILTON [putfile.com]]


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at
the address of copyright@theplanet.com.



- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] FIRST NOTICE OF INFRINGEMENT AND DECLARATION: WARNER
BROS. RECORDS, INC. | PARIS HILTON  [putfile.com]
Date: Sun, 4 Jun 2006 11:55:36 -0400
From: Douglas Kassem | GrayZone, Inc. <grayzone@grayzone.com>
To: <put@putfile.com>, <abuse@theplanet.com>, <admins@theplanet.com>,
<copyright@theplanet.com>

FIRST NOTICE OF INFRINGEMENT AND DECLARATION:  WARNER BROS. RECORDS,
INC./PARIS HILTON

VIA FASCIMILE AND ELECTRONIC MAIL:  +44 870 4861 263

TO: Putfile Ltd.
       Putfile Ltd. Roffe Swayne
       Ashcombe Court, Woolsack Way
       Godalming, Surrey  GU71LQ
       GB
       448704321233
       put@putfile.com

TO: Buzzfactor
        William Michael Fernandez
        http://www.putfile.com/buzzfactor

TO: ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
        1333 North Stemmons Freeway
        Suite 110    Dallas, TX  75207
        Phone:  +1-214-782-7800
        abuse@theplanet.com
        admins@theplanet.com
        copyright@theplanet.com

REGARDING:   http://media.putfile.com

We hereby demand that you IMMEDIATELY CEASE AND DESIST from posting
PIRATED and BOOTLEG MATERIAL in connection with WARNER BROS. RECORDS,
INC. and the artist PARIS HILTON.

IMMEDIATELY REMOVE ALL LINKS TO PIRATED, BOOTLEG AND UNRELEASED MATERIAL
IN CONNECTION WITH THE ARTIST PARIS HILTON:

http://media.putfile.com/Paris-Hilton---Stars-are-Blind
http://media.putfile.com/Paris-Hilton---Heartbeat
http://media.putfile.com/Paris-Hilton---Stop
http://media.putfile.com/Paris-Hilton---Jealousy
http://media.putfile.com/Turn-it-UP-27
http://www.putfile.com/buzzfactor

If you do not comply with this demand immediately, we will seek whatever
remedies are available to us under the United States Copyright law, the
Lanham Act and any applicable international laws or treaties.

WARNER BROS. RECORDS, INC.

I, the undersigned, do solemnly and sincerely declare and CERTIFY UNDER
PENALTY OF PERJURY that:

1. I am the owner or an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner
of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named WARNER
BROS.
RECORDS, INC. ("IP Owner").

2. I have a good faith belief that the auction items or materials
identified in the addendum attached hereto are not authorized by the
above IP Owner, its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP
Owner's rights according to the laws of the (check all that apply):

United States     X
Australia
Canada
EUR
France
Germany
Italy
Japan
Netherlands
United Kingdom      X
All of the above     X

Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or
items claimed to be infringing.

3. I may be contacted at:

Printed Name:  Dorothy Sherman
Title:  Consultant
Company:  Warner Bros. Records, Inc.
Address:  3300 Warner Blvd.
Burbank, CA  91505

Email (correspondence): GrayZone@grayzone.com
Telephone:  212 946-1718
Fax:  718 552-3028

You should understand that this letter constitutes notice to you that
the sale and/or other distribution of this product is unauthorized. This
letter does not constitute a waiver of any right to recover damages
incurred by virtue of any such unauthorized activities, and such rights
as well as claims for other relief are expressly retained.

Finally, notwithstanding our use of putfile.com's required notice form,
we believe that putfile.com's activities and services fall outside the
scope of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA"). Our use of this
form, as required by putfile.com, is meant to facilitate putfile.com's
removal of the infringing product listed above and is not meant to
suggest or imply that putfile.com's activities and services are within
the scope of the DMCA.

I make this declaration conscientiously, believing it to be true and
correct, and in accordance with the laws of each of the countries listed
above.  I am aware and agree that the contents of this statement may be
relied upon against me in any court or arbitration proceeding.

Truthfully,

Dorothy Sherman
DIGITAL SIGNATURE:  VERISIGN


Date:  June 4, 2006



================================================
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE:  This e-mail message, and any attachments
thereto, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may
contain legally privileged and/or confidential information. Any
unauthorized review, use, disclosure or distribution is strictly
prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please contact the
sender by reply email and permanently delete all copies of the original
message.
================================================

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
